In-depth research into Aligned\u2019s target demographic enabled us to devise a highly focused paid advertising campaign, optimized to maximize market penetration and visibility.<\/p>

We employed the flywheel model, a concept popularized by HubSpot, which underscores the importance of aligning every aspect of an organization to deliver an exceptional customer experience. This approach was instrumental in engaging Aligned\u2019s ideal customers at each stage of their journey.<\/p>

To further engage visitors on the website, we implemented an effective lead generation tool. We offered a complimentary video series, accessible in exchange for basic contact details, thereby efficiently expanding their prospect email list.<\/p>

Once these prospects shared their contact information, we maintained and deepened these relationships through targeted email communications. These emails showcased client testimonials, training sessions, and webinars, thereby fostering continuous engagement and interest.<\/p>

Marketing Services Implemented: SEO, Google Search, Facebook Ads, Email Marketing, Display and Remarketing, Hubspot item.title: Antonio Carlo
item.dc:creator: hosting@businessbldrs.com
item.content:encoded:
portfolio

Antonio Carlo

Perfected over the span of three generations from Genoa, Italy, Antonio Carlo makes gourmet, authentic Italian marinara sauce.

1.24 million

TOTAL IMPRESSIONS

262 k

total engagements

28k

total clicks

$0.17

cost per engagement

Scope

  • Influencer Marketing
  • Video Production
  • Social Media Ads
  • Display Advertising

KPIs

  • Awareness
  • Impressions
  • Engagement

Handcrafted over the last 50 years

Handcrafted over the last 50 years, the recipe uses only the freshest of ingredients and is free from all preservatives, added sugars, or artificial flavors. Antonio Carlo worked with Business Builders to create brand awareness around their product shortly after reaching the shelf across Publix retailers. Our team came together to plan a campaign that would not only showcase the quality ingredients and incredible flavors of the sauce, but also promote the ability it has to bring family, friends, and loved ones together around the dinner table.

Platforms

  • Instagram
  • Facebook
  • TikTok

item.title: Enterprise Selling Solutions
item.dc:creator: hosting@businessbldrs.com
item.content:encoded:
portfolio

Enterprise Selling Solutions

ESS was started by HVAC industry professionals who wanted to create a better way for HVAC companies to manage their business.

ESS has been and continues to be one of our most valuable partnerships throughout the years.

The online sales firm provides unique business solutions, sales consulting, website and graphic design services for the HVAC industry. Managing all aspects of a business is difficult, especially for HVAC professionals that have to deal with proposals, scheduling, reporting, etc. ESS came to Business Builders to build them a web application called HVACBizPro, which allows contractors to more easily manage all aspects of their business processes. Its our job to consistently maintain, develop and update the application, ensuring it is working a efficiently as possible. HVACBizPro enables real-time email proposals and service tickets, and gives users an easy way to pay online or apply for financing. It also allows customers to create and track company details, sales reps and service tech information.

WHAT WE DID TO HELP

  • Created a custom web application called HVACBizPro
  • Maintain, develop and update the application
  • Designed and developed HVACBizPro Website
https://youtu.be/W9AfuKTirIg

The results

47%

Increase in Web Traffic

113%

Social Media Traffic Increase

17%

Increased Facebook Likes

WE HELP BUSINESS GROW

SCHEDULE A CALL

item.title: Jax Symphony
item.dc:creator: hosting@businessbldrs.com
item.content:encoded:
portfolio

Jax Symphony

The Jacksonville Symphony is one of Northeast Floridas most important cultural institutions.

Jax Symphonys custom WordPress website is highly responsive, mobile-friendly and receives dedicated maintenance.

Our partnership with Jax Symphony began by reimagining their website to make it more user-friendly and easily navigable.
Our goal with their site was to create a substantial improvement to online user experience. Visitors can now view the custom event calendar we created right on the homepage, giving them an easy way to see what concerts and other events are coming up. They are also able to buy tickets through the third-party ticketing system we set up, which makes it simple to find the right shows.

Additionally, we provide Pay-Per-Click advertising services to improve their keyword rankings and allow their brand to be exposed across a several platforms. The combination of an upgraded website experience, improved Google page rankings and higher web traffic has ultimately led to a massive 201% increase in online sales revenue over the previous year.

WHAT WE DID TO HELP

  • Developed a highly custom WordPress Website
  • Set Up a third-party ticketing system
  • Provided Pay-Per-Click advertising services

The results

201%

increase in online revenue

183k

Impressions

36%

Increase in Web Traffic

WE HELP BUSINESS GROW

SCHEDULE A CALL

Our partnership with Jax Symphony began by reimagining their website to make it more user-friendly and easily navigable.
Our goal with their site was to create a substantial improvement to online user experience. Visitors can now view the custom event calendar we created right on the homepage, giving them an easy way to see what concerts and other events are coming up. They are also able to buy tickets through the third-party ticketing system we set up, which makes it simple to find the right shows.<\/p>

Additionally, we provide Pay-Per-Click advertising services to improve their keyword rankings and allow their brand to be exposed across a several platforms. The combination of an upgraded website experience, improved Google page rankings and higher web traffic has ultimately led to a massive 201% increase in online sales revenue over the previous item.title: Hines
item.dc:creator: hosting@businessbldrs.com
item.content:encoded:
portfolio

Hines

Hines is a global real estate investment, development and management firm, founded in 1957.

Hines Southeast came to Business Builders to fully redesign 3 of their community websites.

With Hines building and managing several newer communities in Northeast Florida, they needed a company to handle the websites, marketing and more for each neighborhood. Every community is unique, and we wanted to reflect that with the websites we created for Markland and Palencia. Markland was designed to to be a friendly community in St. Johns, FL where neighbors can gather together and enjoy the lifestyle of a larger development on an intimate scale.
This new neighborhood being developed by the prestigious Hines team features homes from six of the best contractors in the area. Hines Southeast came to Business Builders to fully redesign Marklands website. The goal of the redesign was to increase leads for the new community while showcasing Marklands luxury atmosphere to potential buyers.

Driving Engagement and Lead Generation Through Strategic Marketing and Custom Web Solutions

Business Builders currently handles several aspects of marketing for Palencia, including social posting, AdWords campaigns, building a custom landing page for their available lots, and more. Our goal is to show off their unique, luxury amenities and give people a hub where they can find out useful information about the community, as well as see advertisements for future events. The landing page we built provides potential buyers with information regarding the lot and a way to get in direct contact with the realty company.

Hines latest Jacksonville project is Southside Quarter, a 110-acre mixed-use property in Jacksonvilles Southside area. Southside Quarter had a landing page for the upcoming development, but it was very simple and didnt provide much information. The BB team took the current landing page and built it out into a full website with 7-10 total pages. The purpose of the new website is to generate leads for people interested in living there, establishing a local business there or renting/buying an office. The site features an available lots focuses on showcasing all the different elements of the area: living, working, recreation and shopping.

WHAT WE DID TO HELP

  • Created three distinct community websites
  • Used social campaigns to show off their unique, luxury amenities
  • Provided potential buyers with information using a streamlined process

The results

3

Responsive Websites

11%

Increase in Facebook Likes

532%

Increase in Site Traffic

WE HELP BUSINESS GROW

SCHEDULE A CALL

With Hines building and managing several newer communities in Northeast Florida, they needed a company to handle the websites, marketing and more for each neighborhood. Every community is unique, and we wanted to reflect that with the websites we created for Markland and Palencia. Markland was designed to to be a friendly community in St. Johns, FL where neighbors can gather together and enjoy the lifestyle of a larger development on an intimate scale.
This new neighborhood being developed by the prestigious Hines team features homes from six of the best contractors in the area. Hines Southeast came to Business Builders to fully redesign Markland\u2019s website. The goal of the redesign was to increase leads for the new community while showcasing Markland\u2019s luxury atmosphere to potential Business Builders currently handles several aspects of marketing for Palencia, including social posting, AdWords campaigns, building a custom landing page for their available lots, and more. Our goal is to show off their unique, luxury amenities and give people a hub where they can find out useful information about the community, as well as see advertisements for future events. The landing page we built provides potential buyers with information regarding the lot and a way to get in direct contact with the realty company.<\/p>

Hines\u2019 latest Jacksonville project is Southside Quarter, a 110-acre mixed-use property in Jacksonville\u2019s \u2018Southside\u2019 area. Southside Quarter had a landing page for the upcoming development, but it was very simple and didn\u2019t provide much information. The BB team took the current landing page and built it out into a full website with 7-10 total pages. The purpose of the new website is to generate leads for people interested in living there, establishing a local business there or renting\/buying an office. The site features an available lots focuses on showcasing all the different elements of the area: living, working, recreation and item.title: All Pro Dad
item.dc:creator: hosting@businessbldrs.com
item.content:encoded:
portfolio

All Pro Dad

All Pro Dad is a nonprofit organization dedicated to helping fathers love and lead their families well.

All Pro Dads website receives over 10 million visitors per year.

They help dads connect with their kids all over the country by sending out daily emails, putting on big events and hosting monthly father-kids breakfasts. Their site also contains hundreds of blog posts that give dads valuable advice on raising their children, being in relationships and providing for their families.

WHY THEY CAME TO US

Their old website got the job done for a time, but with their high traffic and rate of growth, it was time for a serious overhaul. Their website was difficult to navigate, had unclear messaging, loaded slowly and functioned poorly on mobile devices. They needed to update their design, layout and messaging, so they went looking for the right team to solve these issues.A popular website with tons of great info like All Pro Dad should be fast, clear and easy to use.

4+ million

TOTAL IMPRESSIONS

40,000

CLICKS

$$$

RECORD BREAKING SALES

What We Did

  • We optimized their website for speed, making sure all the pages, blogs and links load quickly and securely.
  • Our content team updated the copy so it would clearly explain what they do and who they serve.
  • The Design team add inspirational, modern imagery and custom graphics throughout the site.

Custom Sidebar Navigation

Navigation is also simplified and organized so users can find exactly what theyre looking for quickly. Clean, clear, mobile-responsive, and search engine optimizedAll Pro Dad now has a wonderful new website to share their very important mission.

The results

1,200

New Email Subscribers

113%

Increase in New Users

62%

Increase in Page Views

get results like these

Turn to the team at Business Builders when you need web design, marketing, or branding services in Jacksonville and St. Augustine, FL.

SCHEDULE A CALL

item.title: Bozard Ford Lincoln
item.dc:creator: hosting@businessbldrs.com
item.content:encoded:
portfolio

Bozard Ford Lincoln

Accurate data tracking is crucial to proper client safety and meeting regulatory requirements.

4+ million

TOTAL IMPRESSIONS

40,000

CLICKS

$$$

RECORD BREAKING SALES

Scope

  • Video Production
  • Broadcast TV
  • Display Advertising
  • Paid Search
  • Social Media Ads

KPIs

  • Awareness
  • Impressions
  • Engagement

stand out from the typical automotive style ads.

Bozard Ford Lincoln has been family-owned and operated since 1949 in St. Augustine, Florida. With a focus on building long-lasting customer relationships and serving their community, they have made their mark as an award-winning dealership. Bozard Ford has been the recipient of numerous dealer awards, including the Ford President's Award, which is the highest honor given by the Ford Motor Company for customer satisfaction.

Bozard Ford Lincoln worked with Business Builders to provide direction and vision in regards to their digital marketing presence, wanting to stand out from the typical automotive style ads.

DRIVEN TO INSPIRES SUMMER

https://youtu.be/-hKUjf4E_uM

DRIVEN TO CONNECT

https://youtu.be/NQM6s41A4q4

DRIVEN TO INSPIRE STORY

item.title: Breakwater Construction
item.dc:creator: hosting@businessbldrs.com
item.content:encoded:
portfolio

Breakwater Construction

How Breakwater Construction Achieved 22% Growth in Just One Year with Strategic Marketing

A Case Study on Breakwater Constructions Partnership with Business Builders

Breakwater Construction, a premier custom pool builder in Northeast Florida, had built its business on word-of-mouth marketing. However, after years of steady revenue with no significant growth, they realized they needed a new strategy to scale. Business Builders (BB) stepped in with a data-driven marketing approach, incorporating video content, automation, and strategic planning to help Breakwater reach more potential customers.

Within just one year, Breakwater saw a 22% increase in sales and a 29% increase in gross revenue. Beyond the numbers, the partnership provided clarity, efficiency, and a scalable marketing strategy that continues to drive success.

The Business Builders team brought ideas to the table that enabled us to share our customer-first culture with potential customers.

The Challenge: A Growth Plateau

For nearly two decades, Breakwater Construction had been building quality custom pools, earning a stellar reputation in Northeast Florida. While word-of-mouth marketing had worked well, the company reached a point where it wasnt generating enough leads to fuel business growth.

Key Challenges:

  • "We had several years of doing the same amount of revenue and no realized growth."
  • "We are a small team and didnt have the resources to produce our own marketing content."
  • "Word-of-mouth marketing is always fabulous, but we had hit a roadblock on growth."

To break through this plateau, Breakwater needed a consistent stream of high-quality leads and a marketing strategy that expanded their reach beyond referrals.

What We Did to Help

A Targeted Marketing Strategy

Business Builders developed a comprehensive marketing plan that included video content, an automated lead-nurturing system, and a user-friendly website tool to attract and convert potential customers.

Video Marketing to Reach a Larger Audience

The marketing team worked with Breakwater to create a series of FAQ videos that showcased the companys expertise and customer-first approach.

Business Builders came in with their team, helped us organize our vision, and then shot a series of FAQ videos which resulted in a 22% increase in our number of sales and a 29% increase in our gross revenue.

https://youtu.be/9GcWYFZIwIY Play Play

Pool Cost Calculator for Better Lead Qualification

Business Builders Marketing and Development team introduced an interactive pool pricing calculator on Breakwaters website, allowing potential customers to get a rough estimate before requesting a consultation.

In 2024:

  • 700+ pool estimates were requested
  • 79% of all new contacts utilized this tool

One of the things is our pool calculator on our website. Potential customers can go and enter in some basics about what they want and in a matter of a minute have a rough estimate for their project.

Pool Pricing Estimator

Automated Lead Nurturing for Higher Conversions

Once someone used the pool calculator but didnt request a consultation, Business Builders set up an automated email sequence to stay engaged with the prospect.

10.85% Conversion Rate

A series of automated nurture emails are sent to them so we remain top of mindthis helps convert tire kickers to qualified leads!

Strategic Guidance & Time Savings

The dedicated Business Builders team, led by Autumn and Natalie, provided monthly recap meetings to ensure clear visibility into marketing performance and future strategies.

Autumn and Natalie have a 45-minute to 1-hour monthly recap meeting with us. They give us the progress of how we have done and the direction that we are headed next month, then they take over from there and executesaving us countless hours trying to navigate our marketing on our own.

Their approach went beyond routine updates:

  • Performance-Driven Execution: Monthly meetings (45 min to 1 hour) provided clear insights, strategic direction, and detailed follow-through to drive measurable growth.
  • Lead Quality Focus: Evaluated not just the volume but the quality of leads.
  • System Integration: Seamlessly connected with Builder Trend for efficient data tracking.
  • Pipeline Insights: Monitored the sales pipeline closely to identify what converts.

The results: 22% Growth in Just One Year

Breakwater Construction saw measurable success within the first year of working with BB, proving that a strategic marketing plan can drive real growth.

4,444%

ROI from Paid Search

22%

increase in sales

29%

increase in gross revenue

MORE

qualified leads from website interactions

STRONGER

brand presence and visibility

The amount of growth was a welcome surprise! We get lots of compliments on the quality of our website, videos, and marketing!

More importantly, Breakwater now has a clear, scalable marketing strategy that supports continued long-term growth.

With a solid marketing foundation in place, Breakwater expects to continue its upward trajectory with their Business Builders partnership..

We now have a PLAN and strategy to continue our growth year over year! We anticipate another 20% growth this year with our continued marketing plan with BB.

Next Steps:

  • Continue scaling marketing efforts with BB
  • Further optimize lead generation and conversion processes
  • Maintain steady revenue growth year over year

Thinking about scaling your business like Breakwater Construction?

Contact Business Builders today to see how strategic marketing can help you grow.

SCHEDULE A CALL

Breakwater Construction, a premier custom pool builder in Northeast Florida, had built its business on word-of-mouth marketing. However, after years of steady revenue with no significant growth, they realized they needed a new strategy to scale. Business Builders (BB) stepped in with a data-driven marketing approach, incorporating video content, automation, and strategic planning to help Breakwater reach more potential customers.<\/span><\/p>

      The dedicated Business Builders team, led by Autumn and Natalie, provided <\/span>monthly recap meetings<\/b> to ensure clear visibility into marketing performance and future strategies.<\/span><\/p>

      \u201cAutumn and Natalie have a 45-minute to 1-hour monthly recap meeting with us. They give us the progress of how we have done and the direction that we are headed next month, then they take over from there and execute\u2014saving us countless hours trying to navigate our marketing on our own.\u201d<\/b><\/p>

      Their approach went beyond routine updates:<\/b><\/p>

      • Performance-Driven Execution:<\/b> Monthly meetings (45 min to 1 hour) provided clear insights, strategic direction, and detailed follow-through to drive measurable growth.<\/span><\/li><\/ul>
        • Lead Quality Focus: <\/b>Evaluated not just the volume but the quality of leads.<\/span><\/li><\/ul>
          • System Integration: <\/b>Seamlessly connected with Builder Trend for efficient data tracking.<\/span><\/li>
          • Pipeline Insights:<\/b> Monitored the sales pipeline closely to identify what
